description: This version of the  Man in Tuxedo emoji has the  Dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Black Skin Tone on supported platforms
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man in a tuxedo with dark skin tone exudes sophisticated elegance, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. His crisp white shirt and perfectly tied black bow tie catch the light, emphasizing the smooth, rounded edges characteristic of Apple's design. This emoji conveys a sense of formality, celebration, or readiness for a special occasion, often used to signify attending an event or dressing up.
